Generation VIII.Sword: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.
Generation VIII.Shield: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its massive, jagged teeth can crush a boulder in a single bite. This Pokémon has an extremely vicious disposition.
Generation IX.Violet: Drednaw lurks along the shoreline. When prey come to drink water, Drednaw stretches its neck out and chomps down on them.
